adrFormatAddress: W 15th St, Chelsea, NY 10011, USA

editorialSummary.text: Appointment-only showroom offering handmade, custom-designed dance shoes for men & women.

originalText.text:
I have two pairs of Salamanca tango shoes, both custom made. They are very comfortable, well-made, and beautiful. I have three other pairs of tango shoes from different brands and Salamanca shoes are my favorite. I'm already contemplating my third pair!

Yaisuri is very professional and addresses concerns quickly and to my satisfaction.

text.text:
I have two pairs of Salamanca tango shoes, both custom made. They are very comfortable, well-made, and beautiful. I have three other pairs of tango shoes from different brands and Salamanca shoes are my favorite. I'm already contemplating my third pair!

Yaisuri is very professional and addresses concerns quickly and to my satisfaction.

originalText.text: I've purchased two pairs of very customized shoes from Yaisuri.  They are by far the highest quality shoes I have ever had.  I am a retired professional dancer with a lot of chronic foot problems and these shoes fit perfectly, are much more comfortable than any other tango shoes I have, and are very beautiful.  I had to ask for many custom options and Yaisuri took a lot of time to make sure he had the exact information and measurements to assure the shoes were exactly what I wanted.  I am very happy with them!

text.text: I've purchased two pairs of very customized shoes from Yaisuri.  They are by far the highest quality shoes I have ever had.  I am a retired professional dancer with a lot of chronic foot problems and these shoes fit perfectly, are much more comfortable than any other tango shoes I have, and are very beautiful.  I had to ask for many custom options and Yaisuri took a lot of time to make sure he had the exact information and measurements to assure the shoes were exactly what I wanted.  I am very happy with them!

originalText.text: I have been dancing in two pairs of Salamanca shoes and I'm in love! They're super comfortable, even after hours of dancing. No noticeable wear and tear yet, so they seem to last a long time too. And not to mention they look amazing. I get compliments all the time :)

text.text: I have been dancing in two pairs of Salamanca shoes and I'm in love! They're super comfortable, even after hours of dancing. No noticeable wear and tear yet, so they seem to last a long time too. And not to mention they look amazing. I get compliments all the time :)

originalText.text:
THEY'RE HERE!!!!

I am not a shoe lover in the slightest, but I *LOVE* these shoes and can't stop petting them!  Will have to buy a brush and a another pair to wear outside.   Every time I slip into them my cats come right over to sniff and investigate-- the genuine Italian leather is feline-certified TM.  First thing my boyfriend said when he saw them on my feet was, "Do they make shoes for men too?" (Yes they do.)

Feeling as if I can take on the world with these supporting me all the way!  Bye-Bye Barefoot Tanguera, Hello Bad*ss Brujita-- a pair of too-small-too-tall shoes made me stop dancing, and now Yaisuri's perfect-fit-from-sole-to-heel-to-toe custom shoes will get me back out on the floor!  YAY! :D

Feeling as if I can take on the world with these supporting me all the way!  Bye-Bye Barefoot Tanguera, Hello Bad*ss Brujita-- a pair of too-small-too-tall shoes made me stop dancing, and now Yaisuri's perfect-fit-from-sole-to-heel-to-toe custom shoes will get me back out on the floor!  YAY! :D

originalText.text: Love ALL the shoes I have gotten from Yaisuri so far!  I have recommended her to many of my tango friends and non tango friends and we all feel the same.  Her shoes are top notch and they are a dream to walk and dance in!  Thank you for always being so patient as we come up with a new design/material combo for my hard to fit narrow fit.  I  know I'll be ordering from Yaisuri for years to come!  Thanks again!
